column1: Smoque BBQ////Im from st. louis originally and this is deffinantly in the same vein
column5: goodness...people say the brisket is the best but i just love ribs
column6: so im gonna say the ribs then brisket
column7: haven't had the pulled pork but friends have they said its good
column8: and the new texas sausage is great
column9: just really good flavor all around...
